Title: Ida
Overview: Anna, a young novitiate in 1960s Poland, is on the verge of taking her vows when she discovers a family secret dating back to the years of the German occupation.
production_companies: Danish Film Institute, Portobello Pictures, Eurimages, Canal+ Polska, Opus Film, Polski Instytut Sztuki Filmowej, Phoenix Film Investments, City of Lodz, Phoenix Film Poland
Cast: Agata Trzebuchowska, Agata Kulesza, Joanna Kulig
